meanings.definition: An area filled with sand for children to play in.
meanings.sent1: The kids built a castle in the sandpit at the park.
meanings.sent2: The school playground has a small sandpit for the children.
meanings.sent3: The sandpit turned into a giant cake in the kids' imaginative game.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a sandpit of creativity, shaping new ideas every day.
meanings.sent5: The golden sandpit shimmered under the bright sun, inviting laughter and play.

meanings.definition: A pit or excavation in the ground where sand is found.
meanings.sent1: The workers dug a deep sandpit to extract sand for construction.
meanings.sent2: The archaeologists discovered ancient artifacts in the sandpit.
meanings.sent3: The sandpit revealed layers of history as the shovel unearthed relics.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a sandpit of memories, each grain holding a different story.
meanings.sent5: The sandpit whispered secrets of the past, waiting to be uncovered by curious minds.
